targets.expr: label_replace(redis_instance_info{project=~"$project", instance=~"$instance", instance!~".*exporter.*", redis_mode="standalone", role="master"} and on(instance) (redis_connected_slaves == 0), "display_role", "standalone", "", "")

label_replace(redis_instance_info{project=~"$project", instance=~"$instance", instance!~".*exporter.*", redis_mode="standalone", role="master"} and on(instance) (redis_connected_slaves > 0), "display_role", "master", "", "")

sum by (instance) (rate(redis_commands_duration_seconds_total{project=~"$project", instance=~"$instance", instance!~".*exporter.*"}[5m])) * 1000000 / sum by (instance) (rate(redis_commands_total{project=~"$project", instance=~"$instance", instance!~".*exporter.*"}[5m]))

100 * redis_keyspace_hits_total{project=~"$project", instance=~"$instance", instance!~".*exporter.*"} / (redis_keyspace_hits_total{project=~"$project", instance=~"$instance", instance!~".*exporter.*"} + redis_keyspace_misses_total{project=~"$project", instance=~"$instance", instance!~".*exporter.*"})

100 * rate(redis_keyspace_hits_total{project=~"$project", instance=~"$instance", instance!~".*exporter.*"}[5m]) / (rate(redis_keyspace_hits_total{project=~"$project", instance=~"$instance", instance!~".*exporter.*"}[5m]) + rate(redis_keyspace_misses_total{project=~"$project", instance=~"$instance", instance!~".*exporter.*"}[5m]))
